name: spam_unread_repport.js
description: 1 action not spam and check if vide go to inbox + 10 actions ( show image - (star or important) =>> archive ) LOOP (spam/unread last 1h)+report

name: spam_unread_subject_repport_v2.js
description: 1 action not spam and check if vide go to unread open by subject + 25 actions ( show image - (star or important) =>> archive ) LOOP (spam/unread last 1h)+report+covirsation off

name: spam_unread_subject_repport.js
description: 1 action not spam and check if vide go to unread open by subject + 25 actions ( show image - (star or important) =>> archive ) LOOP (spam/unread last 1h)+report+covirsation off

name: spam_unread_sub.js
description: 1 action not spam and check if vide go to unread+ 25 actions by subject ( show image - (star or important) =>> archive ) LOOP (spam/unread last 1h)+report+covirsation off

name: cmh3_ip_noReply.js
description: cmh3_ip_noReply.js	Open 2 tabs (Spam & Inbox) → Disable categories & conversation view → Process 20 spam emails (≤60min old) as "Not Spam" → Do 20 inbox emails (≤60min old) with actions (show images → random action [star/important/click] → archive) → Repeat 1000 times.

name: CMH3_OFFER.js
description: Open 2 tabs (Spam & Inbox) → mark 20 emails as "Not Spam" → perform 10 Inbox actions (open, show image, click, star/important/reply, archive) → repeat loop.

name: spam_inbox_rep_sub_nav.js
description: Open 2 tabs (Spam & Inbox) → Process 10 spam emails (≤60min old) as "Not Spam" → Do 10 inbox emails navige beetwen page older with actions (show images → random action [open/star/important] → archive) → Repeat 1000 times.

name: cmh8_ip_new_version.js
description: Open 2 tabs (Spam & Inbox) → Process 5 spam emails (≤60min old) as "Not Spam" by subject → Do 5 inbox emails (≤60min old) by subject with actions (open, show image, (star/important/click/reply(max 3/bt)), archive) → repeat loop.
